definition: the breeding season (zool.)/oestrus (period of sexual receptivity of female mammals)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: Chiru, or Tibetan antelope, have arrived for the winter rut.
sentences.chinese: 長角羚或叫藏羚羊已經到了冬季的發情期。

sentences.english: This man seems to have been bitten by a mad dog in 'season'.
sentences.chinese: 這個男人似乎被一條處於發情期的瘋狗給咬了。

sentences.english: Many females return to a mini-cycle several times while weaning kittens.
sentences.chinese: 一些母貓在給小貓斷奶時會出現幾次小的發情期。

sentences.english: During estrus, the female is fertile and will accept a male.
sentences.chinese: 在發情期，母犬可以接受交配並且具有生育能力。

sentences.english: Male monal pheasants are getting a little overheated trying to attract a male.
sentences.chinese: 雄性虹稚進入發情期試圖吸引同伴。

definition: to injure by scratching or clawing
to form a scar/to form a scab
the guilty party files the suit/the thief cries thief
adopted son (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)
